channel.title: Issues on The AfroLatin Weekly Wrap
channel.description: Recent content in Issues on The AfroLatin Weekly Wrap

item.title: Sunday Salsa
item.description: The Salsa Liverpool team give you the end to your weekend. Classes start at 7pm and 8pm with 2 levels at both times and then an hours social before the weekend officially ends (and you can’t start planning your next week of dancing!)
